26 October 2013

T-DOSE 2013 conference,
Speaker: Eric Bariaux, Open source middleware for Internet of Things.

Smart Cities, Assisted Living, Building Automation, Peace of Mind ... So many different applications of IoT, yet they all share a common ground. In this presentation, we'll explore the need for an integration middleware at the heart of IoT solutions.

more at:
http://www.t-dose.org/2013/talks/open-source-middleware-internet-things
title: T-DOSE 2013 Open Source, Eric Bariaux, Open source middleware for Internet of Things
